fixtures.name: default
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Save and continue
</button>

fixtures.name: as a link
fixtures.html: Link button

fixtures.name: disabled
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit" disabled aria-disabled="true">
  Disabled button
</button>

fixtures.name: login
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--login"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Continue
</button>

fixtures.name: login as a link
fixtures.html: Continue

fixtures.name: login disabled
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--login"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit" disabled aria-disabled="true">
  Continue
</button>

fixtures.name: reverse
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--reverse"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Log out
</button>

fixtures.name: reverse as a link
fixtures.html: Log out

fixtures.name: reverse disabled
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--reverse"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit" disabled aria-disabled="true">
  Log out
</button>

fixtures.name: secondary
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--secondary"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Find my location
</button>

fixtures.name: secondary as a link
fixtures.html: Find my location

fixtures.name: secondary as a link, solid background
fixtures.html: Find my location

fixtures.name: secondary disabled
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--secondary"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit" disabled aria-disabled="true">
  Find my location
</button>

fixtures.name: secondary, solid background
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--secondary-solid"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Find my location
</button>

fixtures.name: secondary, solid background disabled
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--secondary-solid"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit" disabled aria-disabled="true">
  Find my location
</button>

fixtures.name: warning
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--warning"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Yes, delete this vaccine
</button>

fixtures.name: warning as a link
fixtures.html: Yes, delete this vaccine

fixtures.name: warning disabled
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button nhsuk-button--warning"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit" disabled aria-disabled="true">
  Yes, delete this vaccine
</button>

fixtures.name: with double click not prevented
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 type="submit">
  Save and continue
</button>

fixtures.name: with double click prevented
fixtures.html:
<button class="nhsuk-button"
  data-module="nhsuk-button"
 data-prevent-double-click="true" type="submit">
  Save and continue
</button>
